response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1,000,000 to you, and we are excited to offer it to you at a special price tailored to reflect its importance to you. We propose a purchase price of $950,000. This offer is designed to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction. Should you be interested in proceeding, please let us know, and we will guide you through the next steps. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
